strong.span: has been postponed to August 3 for Utica Elementary students and August 4 for Newton Elementary students. More information regarding scheduling will be provided at a later date. Thank you.

div.span: A Message from the Technology Department Regarding Zoom
regarding graduation requirements in light of school building closures due to the Coronavirus.

p.span: On Monday, April 20, 2020, Governor DeWine announced that schools will continue with the closure through the remainder of the school year, due to the coronavirus.
We will continue with our virtual learning plans. Staff will continue to create lessons for each of the weeks we are missing face-to-face instruction.

div.span: The Ohio Department of Health has activated a call center for COVID-19 that is open 7 days a week from 9:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m., and the number is 1-833-427-5634.
